page.title: 03Brook Farm
page.content: {Eric Witter}has been at{Brook Farm}for 20 years but the Witters have been there since 1907. The farm is 70 acres he has one regular person working for him, his son Ian.His grass lands cover 58 acres and four acres of potatoes and 8 acres of spring barley.He uses the barley for feed and he uses the barley straw for bedding.He has 60 milking cattle and 20 heifers.Milking times 6.00am and 4.00pm.He finished the first cut of silage by the 14th of June and the second cut by 25th July. Mr Witter bought some hay but he is hoping to make some this year. Mr Witter has 4 tractors.He prefers to buy two second hand tractors than one new one. He has a potato planter and a plough and cultivator and a roller and a harrow. Mr Witter shares the harvester with his brother.
